formattedAddress: 109 Leroy St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 109 Leroy St, New York, NY 10014-3939, USA

originalText.text:
Came here this past weekend for my bestfriends birthday. I like the set-up of how each room has its own spa treatments. Very intimate and great for those whom do not like large crowds. I do wish they had more time slots for reservations.

I definitely plan to come back and the gym is AMAZING ! I didn't get to train but as a former athlete, I am eager to use the equipment.

originalText.text:
LOVE LOVE LOVE!
The facility is nice and clean & the private spa rooms is everything you could want and more. The steamy shower was my favorite part Lol I could have stayed there the whole time. The only thing I was disappointed about was the price amount for only 60 minutes. It is a bit too pricey but If it was 90 minutes then this place will be such a winner.

originalText.text: My friend and I booked a 60 minute private spa session last week. We both enjoyed visiting communal spas before the pandemic, so the allure of being able to enjoy a sauna and steam room in privacy is what drew us to S10 Recovery. My friend and I both have a low risk tolerance when it comes to covid for personal health reasons, so we were a little taken aback when we arrived and saw someone cleaning our room without a mask just prior to our appointment. My friend wasn’t comfortable with this, so I politely asked the front desk staff if there was another clean private spa that hadn’t just had an unmasked person in it. They graciously accommodated our request, which I greatly appreciated and allowed us to have a more relaxing experience. The spa was clean and complete with nice details to create a luxurious environment. This is a good option for spa lovers who aren’t ready to unmask and sweat it out with strangers quite yet. Just be aware that S10 doesn’t check vaccination status or require staff or other guests to wear masks. Although that aspect was a little disappointing, it actually made their willingness to accommodate our hesitation more meaningful.

originalText.text:
Absolutely gorgeous! One of my favorite spots in nyc to relax. You get your own private (super clean) private sauna, steam room and bath tub. You can share it with a friend or go on your own. Loved it.

I go once a week!

originalText.text: We did a cold plunge + sauna and steam experience and it was wonderful! Jonathan was super friendly and helpful. We’ll be back for sure
